CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A novel series of low band gap donor - acceptor copolymers derived from 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene ( BDT ) and 5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo [c][1,2,5]thiadiazole bearing various alkyl side chains , such as PffBB-n ( n = 10 , 12 , 14 , and 16 ) , were developed for high - performance bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) polymer solar cells ( PSCs ).

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------- |
| 4,5bis(2-ethylhexyloxy)-benzo[2,1-b:3,4-b′]dithiophene (BDT) |
| 5,6-difluoro-4,7-bis(4-alkylthien-2-yl)benzo[c][1,2,5]thiadiazole |
| PffBB-n (n = 10, 12, 14, 16) |

These entities are clearly identified as materials in the paragraph as they are described as copolymers or specific chemical compounds used in the development of high-performance bulk heterojunction polymer solar cells.
